updates.title: VAICOM PRO Community Edition for DCS World
updates.releasenotes: Release 2.9.6.7 Hotfix - Fix AV-8B Harrier COMM1 and COMM2 handling, Fix F/A-18C Non SRS PTT Mode VHF TX slot moved to TX3, Fix A-10C II SRS PTT Mode radios not functioning correctly,Fix F-5E SRS PTT Mode radio not functioning correctly
